Posts.Title: Does anyone have dense breast tissue? nanapat6225 nanapat6225

Posts.Content: nanapat6225 wrote: Hi all. my name is Pat,I am 56 and just found this forum.Here is my story I been having regular mammos since I turn 40 all of them have came out clean.Not at any time during these mammos  did the tech tell me I have dense breast tissue.Why becauce in most states it's not manatory.Let me explaine dense tissue .If your tissue are dense it appear white on a mammo and cancer cell or abnormality will not show up but it will on a ultrasound .This happen to me I had to see a surgeon and get a ultrasound to find a lump behind my left nipple.This was done yesterday.since it take 48 hour that does not count weekend I get my results Wed. There is a web sight where people are trying to make it law doc/tech must tell you you have dense tissue.It www.areyoudense.org If this is possitive I will freak out.Since abnormal cells shows up white so does dense tissue.on a mammo, So it like looking for a polar bear in a snowstorm so I read. Log in to post a reply
